description: The Qumir Sunqu project focuses on urban gardening training and the production of biodegradable cultivation kits for vegetables and ornamental plants. Led by an agronomist, the initiative aims to enhance food security in Lima, addressing the challenges posed by urbanization and migration. With values of responsibility and coherence, the project emphasizes environmentally friendly practices throughout its processes, from training to production, fostering self-sufficiency in food production among vulnerable communities.
name: Qumir Sunqu
